languages.text: {n}Наместник выпрямляется в кресле и произносит учтивым, но совершенно равнодушным голосом:{/n} "Перейдем к делам. От лица лучших людей станции Футфол я выражаю вам соболезнования, {mf|Лорд|Леди} фон Валанциус. Мы скорбим о кончине госпожи Теодоры и просим воспринимать это заявление как знак наших дружественных намерений и готовности сотрудничать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Наместник выпрямляется в кресле и произносит учтивым, но совершенно равнодушным голосом:{/n} "Перейдем к делам. От лица лучших людей станции Футфол я выражаю вам соболезнования, {mf|лорд|леди} фон Валанциус. Мы скорбим о кончине госпожи Теодоры и просим воспринимать это заявление, как знак наших дружественных намерений и готовности сотрудничать".

languages.text: {n}Vladaym straightens in his chair and says in a polite but completely indifferent tone,{/n} "Let's talk business. On behalf of the elite of Footfall Station, I offer you my condolences, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. We mourn Lady Theodora's loss and we hope this sentiment is taken as a sign of our good intentions and willingness to cooperate."
languages.original_text: {n}Наместник выпрямляется в кресле и произносит учтивым, но совершенно равнодушным голосом:{/n} "Перейдем к делам. От лица лучших людей станции Футфол я выражаю вам соболезнования, {mf|Лорд|Леди} фон Валанциус. Мы скорбим о кончине госпожи Теодоры и просим воспринимать это заявление как знак наших дружественных намерений и готовности сотрудничать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym straightens in his armchair and says in a polite yet completely indifferent tone,{/n} "Let's talk business. On behalf of the elite of the Footfall station, I offer you my condolences, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. We mourn Lady Theodora's departure and would like to see this sentiment interpreted as a sign of our good intentions and willingness to cooperate."

{n}Vladaym straightens in his chair and says in a polite but completely indifferent tone,{/n} "Let's talk business. On behalf of the elite of Footfall Station, I offer you my condolences, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. We mourn Lady Theodora's loss and we hope this sentiment is taken as a sign of our good intentions and willingness to cooperate."

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムは椅子にピシッと腰を掛け、丁寧ではあるが全く無関心な口調でこう言った。{/n}「仕事の話をしよう。フットフォール・ステーションの上層部を代表して、フォン・ヴァランシウス陛下にお悔やみ申し上げる。レディ・シオドーラの死を悼み、この感情をこちらの善意と協力の意思の表れとして受け止めていただきたい」
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym straightens in his chair and says in a polite but completely indifferent tone,{/n} "Let's talk business. On behalf of the elite of Footfall Station, I offer you my condolences, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. We mourn Lady Theodora's loss and we hope this sentiment is taken as a sign of our good intentions and willingness to cooperate."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムは椅子にピシッと腰を掛け、丁寧ではあるが全く無関心な口調でこう言った。{/n}「仕事の話をしよう。フットフォール・ステーションの上層部を代表して、フォン・ヴァランシウス陛下にお悔やみ申し上げる。レディ・シオドーラの死を悼み、この感情をこちらの善意と協力の意思の表れとして受け止めていただきたい」

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆坐在椅子上，直起身子，以充满礼貌但毫无热情的语气开了口。{/n}“我们来谈正事吧。我谨代表落脚港的精英阶层向您表示哀悼，冯·瓦兰修斯大人。我们哀悼西奥多拉夫人的不幸离世，希望这种情绪能代表我们的友善姿态与合作意愿。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym straightens in his chair and says in a polite but completely indifferent tone,{/n} "Let's talk business. On behalf of the elite of Footfall Station, I offer you my condolences, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. We mourn Lady Theodora's loss and we hope this sentiment is taken as a sign of our good intentions and willingness to cooperate."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆坐在椅子上，直起身子，以充满礼貌但毫无热情的语气开了口。{/n}“我们来谈正事吧。我谨代表落脚港的精英阶层向您表示哀悼，冯·瓦兰修斯大人。我们哀悼西奥多拉夫人的不幸离世，希望这种情绪能代表我们的友善姿态与合作意愿。”

languages.text: {n}Vladaym se yergue en su silla y, después, dice en un tono cortés pero completamente impasible:{/n} «Hablemos de negocios. En nombre de la élite de la estación de Paso, permítame trasmitirle mi pésame, {mf|lord|lady} von Valancius. Lamentamos la pérdida de lady Theodora y esperamos que este sentimiento represente nuestras buenas intenciones y ansias de cooperar».
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym straightens in his chair and says in a polite but completely indifferent tone,{/n} "Let's talk business. On behalf of the elite of Footfall Station, I offer you my condolences, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. We mourn Lady Theodora's loss and we hope this sentiment is taken as a sign of our good intentions and willingness to cooperate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym se yergue en su silla y, después, dice en un tono cortés pero completamente impasible:{/n} «Hablemos de negocios. En nombre de la élite de la estación de Paso, permítame trasmitirle mi pésame, {mf|lord|lady} von Valancius. Lamentamos la pérdida de lady Theodora y esperamos que este sentimiento represente nuestras buenas intenciones y ansias de cooperar».

languages.text: {n}Vladaym se redresse dans son fauteuil et annonce d'un ton poli, mais parfaitement indifférent :{/n} « Parlons affaires. Au nom de l'élite de la station Castel, je vous présente toutes mes condoléances, {mf|seigneur|dame} von Valancius. Nous pleurons la mort de dame Théodora et espérons que ce sentiment vous prouvera la pureté de nos intentions et notre volonté de coopérer. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym straightens in his chair and says in a polite but completely indifferent tone,{/n} "Let's talk business. On behalf of the elite of Footfall Station, I offer you my condolences, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. We mourn Lady Theodora's loss and we hope this sentiment is taken as a sign of our good intentions and willingness to cooperate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym se redresse dans son fauteuil et annonce d'un ton poli, mais parfaitement indifférent :{/n} « Parlons affaires. Au nom de l'élite de la station Castel, je vous présente toutes mes condoléances, {mf|seigneur|dame} von Valancius. Nous pleurons la mort de dame Théodora et espérons que ce sentiment vous prouvera la pureté de nos intentions et notre volonté de coopérer. »

languages.text: {n}Vladaym richtet sich in seinem Stuhl auf und sagt höflich, aber völlig teilnahmslos:{/n} "Reden wir übers Geschäft. Im Namen der Elite der Footfall-Station spreche ich Euch mein Beileid aus, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. Wir betrauern den Verlust von Lady Theodora und hoffen, das zeigt unsere guten Absichten und unseren Kooperationswillen."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym straightens in his chair and says in a polite but completely indifferent tone,{/n} "Let's talk business. On behalf of the elite of Footfall Station, I offer you my condolences, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. We mourn Lady Theodora's loss and we hope this sentiment is taken as a sign of our good intentions and willingness to cooperate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym richtet sich in seinem Stuhl auf und sagt höflich, aber völlig teilnahmslos:{/n} "Reden wir übers Geschäft. Im Namen der Elite der Footfall-Station spreche ich Euch mein Beileid aus, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. Wir betrauern den Verlust von Lady Theodora und hoffen, das zeigt unsere guten Absichten und unseren Kooperationswillen."

languages.text: {n}Vladaym, sandalyesinde doğrulup kibar ama tamamen kayıtsız bir ses tonuyla lafa giriyor.{/n} "Biraz da iş konuşalım. Binliman İstasyonu seçkinleri adına başsağlığı diliyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} von Valancius. Hepimiz Leydi Theodora'nın kaybının yasını tutuyor ve bu duyarlılığımızın da iyi niyetimiz ile iş birliği yapma arzumuzun bir işareti olarak algılanmasını temenni ediyoruz."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym straightens in his chair and says in a polite but completely indifferent tone,{/n} "Let's talk business. On behalf of the elite of Footfall Station, I offer you my condolences, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius. We mourn Lady Theodora's loss and we hope this sentiment is taken as a sign of our good intentions and willingness to cooperate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym, sandalyesinde doğrulup kibar ama tamamen kayıtsız bir ses tonuyla lafa giriyor.{/n} "İşimize bakalım. Binliman İstasyonu seçkinleri adına başsağlığı diliyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} von Valancius. Hepimiz Leydi Theodora'nın kaybının yasını tutuyor ve bu duygunun iyi niyetimiz ile iş birliği yapma isteğimizin bir işareti olarak algılanmasını umuyoruz."
